audioText: Je continuerai à porter ce style cool même si mes parents n'aiment pas.
question: What will the speaker continue doing despite parental disapproval?
explanation: The text states 'Je continuerai à porter ce style cool même si mes parents n'aiment pas' - I will continue to wear this cool style even if my parents don't like it. The verb 'continuerai' is the future tense of 'continuer', and 'cool' means trendy/fashionable.
